name: The Collection
description:
A space shoot-em-up. Shoot as many enemies as you can and go for the high score. The enemies will become faster and more numerous over time.

How to play: 

Hit the 'Z' key to start the game while in the title screen. Move with the direction keys, WASD or a USB controller. Shoot with 'Z', hold 'Z' to rapid fire.

Credits:

Game made by  Elias Mote

VectorBoy made by  David Jalbert

Made in July 2017 for  Fantasy Console Jam
